column1: Smoque BBQ////Delicious as always! I had the half slab rib dinner - St. Louis style (baby back also available for the same price). It came with cole slaw and two sides. I chose baked beans
column2: which had chunks of brisket in it
column4: which were coated in a barbecue spice rub. I finished everything except the fries - I always forget how many they give you.
